Literature.Title: New Antimicrobial Potential and Structural Properties of PAFB: A Cationic, Cysteine-Rich Protein from Penicillium chrysogenum Q176.
Literature.Author: Huber A, Hajdu D, Bratschun-Khan D, Gáspári Z, Varbanov M, Philippot S, Fizil Á, Czajlik A, Kele Z, Sonderegger C, Galgóczy L, Bodor A, Marx F, Batta G

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aspergillus fumigatus ATCC 46645(MIC=0.25µM),Aspergillus niger CSB 12049(MIC=0.50µM),Aspergillus terreus T90(MIC=1µM),Neurospora crassa FGSC 4200(MIC=0.12µM),Penicillium chrysogenum ATCC 10002(MIC=0.50µM),Trichophyton rubrum ATCC 28188(MIC=0.50µM),Candida albicans CBS 5982(MIC=1µM),Candida albicans CBS 5982(80-90% Killing=1µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae BY4741(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=>32µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=>32µM),HCoV-229E(20-30% Inhibition=8µM)
